Description_lang: Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for $287280d. When you Holy Shock, all targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for $325984s1 or healed for $325983s1. Glimmer of Light's total healing and damage is increased by $s3% for each target affected, but is split evenly between each target.You may have Glimmer of Light on up to $287269s1 $?a414708[target][targets].
